content: this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 but this is a great way to get an ad-free downloadable file **materials and details** yarn 200 yards ww cotton crochet hook h 5mm notions yarn needle for weaving in ends optional duster handle or toaster tongs measurement 6 long x 2 5 high x 3 across ______________ email help is available with each pattern purchase please follow snappy tots on your favorites social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun facebook 2 pinterest 3 instagram 4 twitter 5 please check out my other patterns ~ featured sale patterns of the week 6 ~ the rest of my shop for over 500 patterns shop now 7 join my facebook group totally snappy 8 for specials events sneak peeks and giveaways if you have any questions comments or suggestions please send me an email 9 _______________ copyright ©2019 snappy tots aka heidi yates no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission graphics and pattern in part and whole may not be used for personal or profit finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 1 https //snappy-tots com/weekly-wash-9-scrubby-duster/ 2 https //www facebook com/snappytots 3 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 4 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 5 https //twitter com/snappytots 6 http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials 7 http //shop snappy-tots com 8 https //www facebook com/groups/totallysnappy/ 9 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com
